extendedInfo.description: eClac, a simple and practical calculating tool, it has the multiple functions such as calculator, currency exchange, discount calculate, unit exchange and so on.Features:*Calculator, include basic calculate and scientific calculate.*Currency convertion, provides the user with currency rates and currency converting.*Discount calculatitonï¼user can preset the default discount value, it will auto display multi-line data according to user\'s setting to make a comparision. User can also add the new line, and adjust the position in the list as needed.*Unit convertionï¼Convert from among all type of units such as lengths, volumns, speed, etc.Feel free to send your feedback to us!Keyword:calculate, calculator, scientific calculator, currency, rate, currency convertion, exchange, unit, discount, dollar

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An inaccurate calculator....that\'s it!
reviews.comment: A calculator is supposed to take an input and give an accurate output. Simple? This app can\'t do even that much. The folks who have rated this app more than one star are duds in maths I guess. Where in the world have you heard 1 acre equals 1076 sq.ft.? This gross inaccuracy and lots of spelling mistakes in the labels of this app makes it untrustworthy and a waste of time.
